instructions: 1. Update the path in 'args' to point to your athena-browser installation
2. Update UID in socket paths (run 'id -u' to get your user ID)
6. Claude will now have access to all 17 browser control tools!
available_tools: browser_query_content - Query specific content (forms, navigation, article, tables, media)
browser_get_annotated_screenshot - Get screenshot with element annotations
browser_execute_js - Execute JavaScript in page context
window_get_tab_info - Get tab count and active tab
example_prompts: Navigate to google.com and search for 'MCP protocol'
Take a screenshot of the current page
Get me all the forms on this page
Open github.com in a new tab
What's the title of the current page?
Execute JavaScript to click the login button
Show me all interactive elements on this page
Get the accessibility tree for this page
